title: Creen has what can only be discribed as a pink to red ish hue. I've tryoed everything to get it to go away but I can not. Most times it's not noticeable but on bright or white screens it is. I need to have my screen on full brightness for where I work, and most times I'm on a white screen, it is very bothersome to say the least
content: I've tried setting the color to dynamic, to boost to normal.  But to no avail
